articles.author: Jenna Portnoy
articles.title: On four year anniversary of covid, families remember flags on Mall - The Washington Post
articles.description: Covid memorial flags are being archived as America moves further from the World Health Organization’s pandemic declaration, four years ago this month.
articles.content: Return to menuEd Koenig searched up one row and down the next, up and down, for hours. But on that warm, breezy day in September2021, he couldnt find the flag he had dedicated online to Jody Settle, … [+2043 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: US Senator asks social media companies about preparations for elections in India, other nations - Deccan Herald
articles.description: Washington, Mar 16 (PTI) An influential American Senator on Friday asked the US social media companies as to what preparations they have made for elections in India, where social media platforms, including Meta-owned WhatsApp, have a long track record of ampl…
articles.content: Bennet then asked about details of their new policies and people that have placed for India elections. What, if any, new policies have you put in place to prepare for the 2024 Indian election? How ma… [+251 chars]
